name: Slav Brothers 2: Reloaded
description:
Do you got what it takes, chump? The strongest Slavs in the northeastern hemisphere are at it again, and this time its for real! Among the roster of seventeen lovable stereotypical characters, pick a team of your three favorites and beat the shit outta the other guys. Coming soon: Story mode, a playable bear, a playable drunk paraplegic, and maybe more???

Made to be played with Xbox 360 controller. Not all inputs possible on keyboard.

Discord: https://discord.gg/qF5V8x4

Twit: https://twitter.com/voluptuousmeat
